name: Residential CAC, ICT, Precond (EE+DR)
energy_efficiency_source: Determined by custom savings shape information in 'tsv_features'

installed_cost_source.notes: Total installed cost is average of low/high 'ESTAR Connected Thermostat' values plus installed costs for best CAC

source_data.title: U.S. Department of Energy Commercial Reference Building Models of the National Building Stock
source_data.author: Deru et al. 2011

source_data.title: Grid-Interactive Efficient Building Technology Cost, Performance, and Lifetime Characteristics
source_data.author: Nubbe et al. 2020

source_data.title: Grid-Interactive Efficient Building Technology Cost, Performance, and Lifetime Characteristics
source_data.author: Nubbe et al. 2020

market_scaling_fractions_source: Calculated based on the apply logic used in ResStock; applies to households with an existing central AC system and electric baseboard heating
_description: Highest efficiency central AC unit in 2019 combined with an internet-connected thermostat (ICT) and pre-cooling and pre-heating in anticipation of DR events
